Package com.currencysystem.webservices.currencyserver

Interface CurrencyServerSoap

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
CurrencyServerSoapProxy, CurrencyServerSoapStub
public interface CurrencyServerSoap
extends java.rmi.Remote

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String activeCurrencies​(java.lang.String licenseKey)
    Returns a semicolon-separated list of active currencies.
    void adminFXFeed​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String feedID, java.lang.String URL, java.lang.String userID, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password, CurncsrvFXFeedAction action)
    Adds the specified FX feed to the feeds list, optionally replacing the existing feeds.
    void adminFXMode​(java.lang.String licenseKey, CurncsrvFXModeMultiple multiple, CurncsrvFXModeLock lockCurrencies)
    Sets the FX mode (defining how data is loaded and updated in general, and from multiple FX feeds).
    void adminLoad​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String file)
    Loads a settings file.
    void adminMessage​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String text, CurncsrvMessageType type)
    Sends a message as specified in the notification options.
    void adminReset​(java.lang.String licenseKey, CurncsrvResetFlags flags)
    Resets all software settings to their default values.
    void adminSave​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String file)
    Saves a settings file.
    void adminUpdateNow​(java.lang.String licenseKey)
    Establishes a connection to the data source(s) and updates the currency data.
    java.lang.String allCurrencies​(java.lang.String licenseKey)
    Returns a semicolon-separated list of currencies.
    java.lang.Object convert​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String fromCurrency, java.lang.String toCurrency, double amount, boolean rounding, java.lang.String format, CurncsrvReturnRate returnRate, java.lang.String time, java.lang.String type)
    Converts a currency amount.
    java.lang.String copyright​(java.lang.String licenseKey)
    Returns the copyright information provided by the data source(s), if any.
    java.lang.String countryToCurrency​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String country, boolean activeOnly)
    Returns a currency code (ISO 4217 Alpha-3) associated to the specified country code (ISO 3166 Alpha-2).
    java.lang.String currencyCustom​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale)
    Returns the currency custom string, based on the specified locale.
    java.lang.String currencyEntity​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale, CurncsrvEntityDenomination denomination, boolean titleStyle)
    Returns the name of the entity associated to the currency, based on the specified locale, denomination (short or official) and title style.
    boolean currencyExists​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, boolean activeOnly)
    Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency is included in the list of active currencies or of all currencies.
    long currencyFeeds​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns the number of FX feeds providing exchange rate data for the currency.
    long currencyHits​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns the number of times this currency has been referenced by a COM object or by the Web service.
    boolean currencyLegalTender​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency is legal tender.
    java.lang.String currencyName​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale, boolean titleStyle)
    Returns the extended name of the currency, based on the specified locale and title style.
    boolean currencyPhysical​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency is a physical currency.
    long currencyPopularity​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns the currency popularity value (1 = high, 2 = medium, 3 = low).
    java.lang.String currencyRegime​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns the identifier of a regime or monetary union, or an empty string.
    java.lang.String currencySmallestUnit​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns the smallest unit for the currency.
    java.lang.String currencySubunit​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale, CurncsrvSubunitInflection inflection, boolean titleStyle)
    Returns the subunit name, based on the specified locale, inflection (singular or plural) and title style.
    java.lang.String currencySymbol​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale)
    Returns the currency symbol, based on the specified locale.
    java.lang.Object currencyToCountry​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, CurncsrvReturnCountry returnCountry)
    Returns a country code (ISO 3166 Alpha-2) associated to the specified currency (ISO 4217 Alpha-3).
    java.lang.String currencyToDomain​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns a domain suffix (IANA TLD) associated to the specified currency code (ISO 4217 Alpha-3).
    java.lang.Object currencyToLocale​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, CurncsrvReturnLocale returnLocale)
    Returns a locale identifier (Windows LCID or RFC 4646) associated to the specified currency code (ISO 4217 Alpha-3).
    boolean currencyTriangulation​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency is a subunit of BaseUnit at a constant rate.
    java.lang.String currencyUnit​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale, CurncsrvUnitInflection inflection, boolean titleStyle)
    Returns the unit name, based on the specified locale, inflection (singular or plural) and title style.
    boolean currencyWarning​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency has been referenced by a recent warning condition.
    java.lang.String domainToCurrency​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String domain, boolean activeOnly)
    Returns a currency code (ISO 4217 Alpha-3) associated to the specified domain name (string ending with IANA TLD).
    java.lang.String export​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String format, java.lang.String encoding, java.lang.String baseCurrency, java.lang.String locale, java.lang.String flags, java.lang.String serviceLicenseKey, java.lang.String serviceExpirationTime, java.lang.String serviceRenewalURL, java.lang.String errorCode, java.lang.String errorMessage, java.lang.String time, java.lang.String type)
    Returns a string with information on the active currencies in the specified format.
    java.lang.String localeToCurrency​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String locale, boolean activeOnly)
    Returns a currency code (ISO 4217 Alpha-3) associated to the specified locale identifier (Windows LCID or ISO 639-2 Alpha-2).
    java.lang.String message​(java.lang.String licenseKey)
    Returns the message(s) from the data source(s), if any.
    java.lang.Object rate​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String baseCurrency, java.lang.String toCurrency, boolean rounding, java.lang.String format, CurncsrvReturnRate returnRate, java.lang.String time, java.lang.String type)
    Returns the exchange (conversion) rate.
    java.lang.String source​(java.lang.String licenseKey)
    Returns the name(s) of the data source(s).
    java.lang.Object time​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currencies, CurncsrvTimeInformation information, CurncsrvTimePriority priority, CurncsrvReturnTime returnTime, java.lang.String time, java.lang.String type)
    Returns time information about the specified currency or currencies, or the current time.
    java.lang.String version​(java.lang.String licenseKey)
    Returns the software version.

  • Method Details

    • activeCurrencies

      java.lang.String activeCurrencies​(java.lang.String licenseKey) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns a semicolon-separated list of active currencies.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • adminFXFeed

      void adminFXFeed​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String feedID, java.lang.String URL, java.lang.String userID, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password, CurncsrvFXFeedAction action) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Adds the specified FX feed to the feeds list, optionally replacing the existing feeds. Access to this administrative operation may be restricted.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • adminFXMode

      void adminFXMode​(java.lang.String licenseKey, CurncsrvFXModeMultiple multiple, CurncsrvFXModeLock lockCurrencies) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Sets the FX mode (defining how data is loaded and updated in general, and from multiple FX feeds). Access to this administrative operation may be restricted.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • adminLoad

      void adminLoad​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String file) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Loads a settings file. Access to this administrative operation may be restricted.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

      void adminMessage​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String text, CurncsrvMessageType type) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Sends a message as specified in the notification options. Access to this administrative operation may be restricted.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

      void adminReset​(java.lang.String licenseKey, CurncsrvResetFlags flags) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Resets all software settings to their default values. Access to this administrative operation may be restricted.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

      void adminSave​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String file) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Saves a settings file. Access to this administrative operation may be restricted.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • adminUpdateNow

      void adminUpdateNow​(java.lang.String licenseKey) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Establishes a connection to the data source(s) and updates the currency data. Access to this administrative operation may be restricted.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • allCurrencies

      java.lang.String allCurrencies​(java.lang.String licenseKey) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns a semicolon-separated list of currencies.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • convert

      java.lang.Object convert​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String fromCurrency, java.lang.String toCurrency, double amount, boolean rounding, java.lang.String format, CurncsrvReturnRate returnRate, java.lang.String time, java.lang.String type) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Converts a currency amount. The result is either a number or a string which can optionally be rounded and formatted. When a string is returned, either fromCurrency or toCurrency (but not both) may contain a list of semicolon-separated active currencies. Leave the time and type parameters empty for forward compatibility.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • copyright

      java.lang.String copyright​(java.lang.String licenseKey) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the copyright information provided by the data source(s), if any.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • countryToCurrency

      java.lang.String countryToCurrency​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String country, boolean activeOnly) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns a currency code (ISO 4217 Alpha-3) associated to the specified country code (ISO 3166 Alpha-2).
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencyToCountry

      java.lang.Object currencyToCountry​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, CurncsrvReturnCountry returnCountry) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns a country code (ISO 3166 Alpha-2) associated to the specified currency (ISO 4217 Alpha-3).
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencyToDomain

      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencyToLocale

      java.lang.Object currencyToLocale​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, CurncsrvReturnLocale returnLocale) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns a locale identifier (Windows LCID or RFC 4646) associated to the specified currency code (ISO 4217 Alpha-3).
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencyCustom

      java.lang.String currencyCustom​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the currency custom string, based on the specified locale. The currency parameter may contain a list of semicolon-separated active currencies.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencyEntity

      java.lang.String currencyEntity​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale, CurncsrvEntityDenomination denomination, boolean titleStyle) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the name of the entity associated to the currency, based on the specified locale, denomination (short or official) and title style. The currency parameter may contain a list of semicolon-separated active currencies.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

      boolean currencyExists​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, boolean activeOnly) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency is included in the list of active currencies or of all currencies.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencyFeeds

      long currencyFeeds​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the number of FX feeds providing exchange rate data for the currency.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencyName

      java.lang.String currencyName​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale, boolean titleStyle) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the extended name of the currency, based on the specified locale and title style. The currency parameter may contain a list of semicolon-separated active currencies.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencyPhysical

      boolean currencyPhysical​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency is a physical currency.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencyPopularity

      long currencyPopularity​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the currency popularity value (1 = high, 2 = medium, 3 = low). The value is the inverse of the Currency Rank (1 = low, 2 = medium, 3 = high).
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencyRegime

      java.lang.String currencyRegime​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the identifier of a regime or monetary union, or an empty string. The currency parameter may contain a list of semicolon-separated active currencies.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencySmallestUnit

      java.lang.String currencySmallestUnit​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the smallest unit for the currency. Trailing zero characters are used to specify the preferred format for rounding. The currency parameter may contain a list of semicolon-separated active currencies.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencySubunit

      java.lang.String currencySubunit​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale, CurncsrvSubunitInflection inflection, boolean titleStyle) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the subunit name, based on the specified locale, inflection (singular or plural) and title style. The currency parameter may contain a list of semicolon-separated active currencies.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencySymbol

      java.lang.String currencySymbol​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the currency symbol, based on the specified locale. The currency parameter may contain a list of semicolon-separated active currencies.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencyTriangulation

      boolean currencyTriangulation​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency is a subunit of BaseUnit at a constant rate.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencyUnit

      java.lang.String currencyUnit​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale, CurncsrvUnitInflection inflection, boolean titleStyle) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the unit name, based on the specified locale, inflection (singular or plural) and title style. The currency parameter may contain a list of semicolon-separated active currencies.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • currencyWarning

      boolean currencyWarning​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency has been referenced by a recent warning condition.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

      Throws:

    • export

      java.lang.String export​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String format, java.lang.String encoding, java.lang.String baseCurrency, java.lang.String locale, java.lang.String flags, java.lang.String serviceLicenseKey, java.lang.String serviceExpirationTime, java.lang.String serviceRenewalURL, java.lang.String errorCode, java.lang.String errorMessage, java.lang.String time, java.lang.String type) throws java.rmi.RemoteException

    • message

      java.lang.String message​(java.lang.String licenseKey) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the message(s) from the data source(s), if any.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

    • rate

      java.lang.Object rate​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String baseCurrency, java.lang.String toCurrency, boolean rounding, java.lang.String format, CurncsrvReturnRate returnRate, java.lang.String time, java.lang.String type) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the exchange (conversion) rate. The result is either a number or a string which can optionally be rounded and formatted. When a string is returned, either baseCurrency or toCurrency (but not both) may contain a list of semicolon-separated active currencies. Leave the time and type parameters empty for forward compatibility.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException

      java.lang.String source​(java.lang.String licenseKey) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Returns the name(s) of the data source(s).

      Returns time information about the specified currency or currencies, or the current time.
